body:
@junrao, that sounds good to me.

In the future, I think it will be good to remove the `Struct` reference from the request classes, I did a quick prototype and will submit a PR if it works out.
This PR has over 80+ unrelated commits and has conflict. Can you please rebase to current trunk to it only contains the relevant commits for this PR. Thanks.
@halorgium, do you think you could change your PR to simply call `struct.clear();` in `ProduceRequest.clearPartitionRecords`?

@guozhangwang i updated the config doc and i also changed the default cleanup interval to 10 minutes. 1 minute doesn't really seem that sensible to me.

@enothereska we can create a jira
Thanks for the perseverance, the system tests passed, so LGTM. Merged to trunk and 0.10.2 after a couple of trivial clean-ups (I wrote this shortly before I merged, but forgot to send it).
@dpkp, are you still planning to submit a KIP for this? Would be nice to get this in for the next release.

@mjsax @guozhangwang Between 89fb02aa8 getting merged and 6264cc15 we ended up with mismatched naming. Easy to miss since system tests are being executed on just the branch the user specifies, not a merged branch (and even then turn around time can cause problems).

Kicked off https://jenkins.confluent.io/job/system-test-kafka-branch-builder/713/ to try to validate we properly run the compatibility test. When ready, this needs to go to trunk and 0.10.2
@enothereska Can you trigger a Jenkins build to verify it doesn't break anything (lesson learned from my own PR last time... :( )
